hero.title: The Software That Powers Hospitality
hero.description: SmartHotel provides a complete solution for effective hotel management

about.title: About SmartHotel
about.desc1: SmartHotel is a hotel management system developed by local software specialists. Managing hotel operations is simplified with SmartHotel management technology, which controls processes for improved efficiency.
about.desc2: SmartHotel offers an intuitive user interface, comprehensive functionality for all areas of hotel management, secure data storage and meets the needs of all types of hotels.
about.desc3: The software provides key features as; front desk & back office operations (with integrated accounting), reservation management, housekeeping, assigning rooms, managing room inventory, and performing accounting and billing functions.

features.head: Some characteristic features
features.item2: - Single dashboard to control all operations

features.controlStatus: Display and control of current room status

download.heading: built for hotels of all sizes

coreFeatures.heading: The software created for hotel management solutions
coreFeatures.organizedLists2: Consult convenient housekeeping and guest lists.
coreFeatures.makeSure: Make sure your strategy adjustments are based on data, not on your instincts. Browse through all reports in the SmartHotel and grasp how your business is going.
coreFeatures.consult: Immediately add extra comments to keep your team informed.
coreFeatures.implementation: Get painless implementation, easy training, and an intuitive interface without sacrificing transparency.
coreFeatures.speedProcess: Get a clear overview of all arriving guests and check-in guests in no-time, even group reservations. Quickly check who has already paid or not and speed up the process.
